ι_sq_zero:
theorem graded_algebra.ι_sq_zero (m : M) : graded_algebra.ι R M m * graded_algebra.ι R M m = 0 :=
  by
  rw [graded_algebra.ι_apply, direct_sum.of_mul_of]
  refine' dfinsupp.single_eq_zero.mpr (Subtype.ext <| ι_sq_zero _)
#align graded_algebra.ι_sq_zero graded_algebra.ι_sq_zero
ι_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr↥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2021 Eric Wieser. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Eric Wieser
-/
theorem graded_algebra.ι_apply (m : M) :
    graded_algebra.ι R M m =
      DirectSum.of (fun i => «expr↥ » ((ι R : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M _ _).range ^ i)) 1
        ⟨ι R m, by simpa only [pow_one] using LinearMap.mem_range_self _ m⟩ :=
  rfl
#align graded_algebra.ι_apply graded_algebra.ι_apply
lift_ι_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr↥ » -/
theorem graded_algebra.lift_ι_eq (i : ℕ)
    (x : ((ι R : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R (exterior_algebra R M)).range ^ i : Submodule R (exterior_algebra R M))) :
    graded_algebra.lift_ι R M x =
      DirectSum.of (fun i => «expr↥ » ((ι R).range ^ i : Submodule R (exterior_algebra R M))) i x :=
  by
  cases' x with x hx
  dsimp only [Subtype.coe_mk, DirectSum.lof_eq_of]
  refine' Submodule.pow_induction_on_left' _ (fun r => _) (fun x y i hx hy ihx ihy => _) (fun m hm i x hx ih => _) hx
  · rw [AlgHom.commutes, direct_sum.algebra_map_apply]
    rfl
  · rw [AlgHom.map_add, ihx, ihy, ← map_add]
    rfl
  · obtain ⟨_, rfl⟩ := hm
    rw [AlgHom.map_mul, ih, graded_algebra.lift_ι, lift_ι_apply, graded_algebra.ι_apply R M, direct_sum.of_mul_of]
    exact direct_sum.of_eq_of_graded_monoid_eq (Sigma.subtype_ext (add_comm _ _) rfl)
#align graded_algebra.lift_ι_eq graded_algebra.lift_ι_eq
